title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: resist printed on ribbed plain weave
description: Roll composed of six sections of silk sewed end to end; one end pasted to paper on wooden roll, other pasted to paper serving as cover and bearing inscription.  Silk printed with 105 small-scale repeating patterns, largely in dot and lozenge designs, in white on a blue ground.  Patterns are in rectangles of various widths, arranged in five lengthwise bands.
name: Textile
